ygData.subject: Re: Level and Weapon Used
ygData.msgSnippet: I have an 81 str and really have no weight problems.   I ditched the shiny armor for wisdom type items,   my weight is like 68/81 when i have nothing in my
ygData.messageBody:
I have an 81 str and really have no weight problems. I ditched the
shiny armor for wisdom type items, my weight is like 68/81 when i have
nothing in my inventory except packs. The 158 wisdom is well worth the
lower AC..

Mr. J Daniels


On Mon, 28 Jun 1999, Kris Becan wrote:

> From: "Kris Becan" <phonic@...>
>
> I notice that most of you are using 2H blunt weapons. Do ya'll have problems
> with the weight issues? If so what do you use to compensate it? I have a
> darken wood shield and that gives me a greater lightstone glow and +9 str. I
> really enjoy having that shield for the fact of being able to carry more
> stuff. Anyway my thoughts.
>
> > well, i mainly use a glowing crook..i tried the hammer, and didn't really
> care for it because of the delay....gonna try to get me a staff of the
> observer somtime...if i can ever drag myself away from cazic (;
> >
> > (\/)ystik
> > lv 36 <as of now> human cleric
> >
>
>
